thread.title: Call of Duty World League Goes Big on Black Ops 3 as eSport
thread.title_full: Call of Duty World League Goes Big on Black Ops 3 as eSport - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Call of Duty World League Goes Big on Black Ops 3 as eSport
text: Activision confirms that it's overhauling the eSports efforts surrounding its upcoming Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 first-person shooter. The large publisher is creating a Call of Duty World League, which is composed of Pro and Challenge (amateur) divisions. Across LAN events, a total sum of $3 million (€2.67 million) can be won by fans of the game. The world of eSports is growing by leaps and bounds, and while big titles like Dota 2 or League of Legends, not to mention StarCr... »
